SEARCH
Package org.red5.net.websocket

Class WebSocketConnection

java.lang.Object
org.red5.server.AttributeStore
org.red5.net.websocket.WebSocketConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<WebSocketConnection>, IAttributeStore, ICastingAttributeStore, AttributeStoreMXBean
public class WebSocketConnection extends AttributeStore implements Comparable<WebSocketConnection>
WebSocketConnection
This class represents a WebSocket connection with a client (browser).
Author:
Paul Gregoire
See Also:
  • rfc6455
